summary: The candidate is a better fit for Job 2 (Data Analyst) due to their validated Python and SQL skills. Job 1 (Cybersecurity Analyst) has no directly or indirectly supported skills matched. For Job 2, the candidate has directly supported Python skills which meets the requirements. They also have indirectly supported SQL skills. No validation available via Github for visualization or statistics skills. They are missing data cleaning and reporting skills. Job 2 has a significantly higher match score.
